card.name: CW - CCW407 - SearchWorks Maintenance Order Search

data.text:
Please make sure that the framework for the Maintenance Order search in SearchWorks has the same layout as the Index 360 frontend and that the same amount calculations are performed when the search result is returned.

Please also make sure that the search type is disabled by default and that it can be switched on by the branch admin or the support desk.

No images must be returned.
